name: Bubble Foam Pop
description:
Bubble Foam Pop is a perfect free brain training game – Solve the fun puzzles! Explore over 900 levels and master all the challenging puzzles. Collect Keys to advance to the next level of puzzle games! Let the fun begin today, download now and match at least 3 bubbles of the same color to pop. Beat all the challenges and collect keys to win levels.
How to play:
1.Tap where you want the bubble.
2.To group 3 or more bubbles to make them burst.
